name: Nothing to Fear
description:
A fun little demo for a project made in school. You play as Benjamin, a young adult who is trying to make his way into an opening ceremony for a hotel resort where his friend invited him. Unfortunately he takes a wrong turn and ends up on a road that takes him to an old abandoned mansion. As a poor and jobless man Benjamin does what he has to survive, and that includes taking and selling what is not his. So he sees a chance and takes it, resulting in an unpleasant situation.

From Blackout <3
